BIO

DOB: 25/04/1994

Zain is a passionate Software Developer with a love for learning all things related to Game, Software, Web and App Development.

An alumni of the Letterkenny Institute of Technology, Zain holds degrees in BSc in Computing and Game Development and BSc Honours in Computer Sciences and Game Development (graduation most recently in 2016). Zain pursued this field because of his curosity in video game mechanics and the implementation of algorithms in video games.

The Computing industry is ever evolving and so Zain has worked on his other passions namely Web and App Development to learn new skills and at the same time improving on existing skills such as Java, C# and the Unity3D game engine.

Zain is highly active on GitHub and LinkedIn, also feel free to drop him an email or view his CV. All the relevant links can be found on the homepage.

All project descriptions and source code can be found in the My Work section.
